task.title: Invoices
task.shortdesc: Invoices are a list of goods sent or services provided with a statement or bill of the sum due.

taskbody.context:
Square users can easily create and send custom invoices for free from the Square Invoice app, their desktop, or within the Square POS system.
To create and send custom invoices for your customers:

step.cmd: Enter the customer's information or select an existing customer from your store directory.

substep.cmd: Customer information includes customer name and email address.

step.cmd: Next, enter the invoice details. The invoice details include an optional title, Invoice ID, and Invoice Method.

substep.cmd: Square users also can set the frequency, create a custom message and also send the Invoice at a specfic time.

step.cmd: In Line Items, enter the unit or custom amount for your goods and services. Square users can also select predefined items from the item library and set the quantity.
Then, hit the "Send" button for your customers to receive the invoice in their inbox.
